intro: I am a software developer originally from England, now living in the Dallas, TX area.
As a former educator and instructional designer, I love to create websites, apps, and games that are as informative as they are aesthetically pleasing.
You can have a look at some of my work here.
about: Hello! I'm Jon, a Full-Stack developer from England and based in Texas.

After graduating from the University of Birmingham with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and moving to the US, initially I found a calling to the world of education. I spent many years as a 5th grade teacher of Math and Science, but the COVID-19 pandemic made me re-evaluate my career path.

I chose to complete a coding bootcamp at Thinkful to help engineer a return to development, and as recent graduate, I am now honing my skills and knowledge. My experience at Thinkful has taught me to approach projects with a user-centered mindset, consistently striving to create effeicient and intuitive user experiences.

I am eager to bring my passion for creating meaningful products and delivering exceptional results to your company! Whether working in a team or individually, I love to solve problems, improve my craft, and make a positive impact.
